inclusion.criterion: American Indian men and women 40 years of age or older
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Type 2 DM (according to 1997 ADA criteria and/or previously diagnosed by former ADA or WHO criteria)
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: LDL cholesterol >= 100 mg/dL within the previous 12 months
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: New York Heart Association Stage III- IV congestive heart failure
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: SBP >180 mmHg (2% of population) or patients with known causes of hypertension
exclusion.label: met
